Pre-Game Insights: Armenia have lost their last five Nations League matches, and conceded 17 goals in those fixtures.
Armenia have at least won two of their last five home matches.
Armenia have at least scored in 10 of their last 14 games in all competitions.
Latvia has failed to win their two most recent matches in the competition, but prior to these results they did win their last five Nations League games.
Latvia have lost or been defeated on penalties in 11 of their last 15 fixtures.
Latvia is winless in their last eight games on the road, losing six of those clashes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Armenia beat Kazakhstan 2-1 last time out on June 7.
Latvia narrowly beat Faroe Islands 1-0 thanks to a goal in the 50th minute from Andrejs Ciganiks.
